doc:
Jan Leighton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jan_Leighton 0 Jan Leighton (December 27, 1921 - November 16, 2009) was an American actor and model who appeared in more than 3,000 roles. He specialized in portraying historic characters, but also worked as a voice actor and hand model. He was credited by the Guinness Book of World Records with having played more roles than any other actor. Jan_Leighton ( December_27_,_1921 - November_16_,_2009 ) was an_American_actor and model who appeared in more_than_3,000_roles . He specialized in portraying historic_characters , but_also worked as a_voice_actor_and_hand_model . He was_credited by the_Guinness_Book of World_Records with having_played more_roles than any_other_actor .
